resources.string: Tap here to select and install them
Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, Data usage, Flight mode
A preview of normal dark notifications
After you examined the result, and optionally sent an error log, you need to manually reboot to finish the installation!
You need to reboot to finish the installation!
Overlays failed to install. Click the info button next to the overlay\'s name to reveal why, and optionally email a log to the support team.
One reason an app fails to install is that the app version doesn\'t match the overlays version. We usually update the theme and add support for new versions within a few days, so please be patient.

In the process of installing or uninstalling the Android System overlay some apps might force close. This is expected, and normal. Everything will work fine once you rebooted after installation is completed.

When using dark notifications: Some notification texts are hardcoded black, e.g. WhatsApp notifications. This fix adds a shadow around all text, making black text visible. You can see how it looks in the preview above.
Notification fix makes black text visible, e.g. WhatsApp notifications.

Installing an overlay, or any APK, on Samsung right after a reboot will take a lot of time. The device needs around 4 mins to finish all the startup processes. If you just rebooted, we recommend waiting a moment before installing overlays or change background and accents.\n\nHave fun theming :)
You need to reboot manually to finish uninstall.

You can theme 181 apps with Swift Installer. We provide dialogs at certain places in the app containing important information to ensure you get the best experience possible. Make sure to read the information when it shows up :)

The best way to keep all overlays working over time is to disable automatic updates in Play Store, and update your apps when we update the theme. This way the theme code and app code will match, and work.\n\nBefore updating your firmware you must uninstall all active overlays. And if you update an app from Play Store, you need to update the respective overlay.
You can change to your favourite background and accent color before installing overlays. Input any color code you want and create that personal feeling!
Swift Installer makes your system dark, and personal. It\'s important for you to get to know the installer before using it, so please take a moment and read the following guide…

The first install will require you to install all apps manually, and this means a lot of clicking. Once the first install is done, it will all be much smoother and faster due to our update system. There is a learning curve, but once you get a hang of it, you\'ll find it easy to use.\n\nNote that we cannot guarantee a stable experience if you use this app in combination with native Samsung themes or Substratum overlays.

A theme contain overlays, and it\'s the overlay that applies on top of an app and themes it. Overlays gets installed as APK\'s on your device. By pressing \'Give\' you acknowledge and accept this. \n\n We also need storage permission as we temporarily place the APK on the storage before installing it. Press \'Give\' to grant the permission. Lastly, we use a special Samsung permission to activate overlays on reboot.

The material theme uses a slightly lighter or darker colors for cards, dialogs, popups etc. to distinguish the background from the themed app background. Flat theme is just flat, and the background color is mostly the same everywhere.

This option is only tested on stock ROMs. Custom ROMs are not tested and they might cause conflicts with this option. If you want to use this option on a custom ROM, make sure you have adb debugging enabled and the rescue script available.

Due to Samsung restrictions, this overlay won\'t be enabled on its own. After you install the overlays and reboot, you will just need to run the enable script from your desktop or laptop to make it work correctly. You can find the script in the Important informations document, linked in the Play Store description of Swift Installer.
Here are some useful links if you need help:
New overlays were enabled at boot. The last step is to make a quick reboot in order for all apps to reload with the new colors. Tap this notification to proceed
Restart SystemUI now to reload resources.
New overlays enabled at boot. The last step is to make a quick reboot in order for all apps to reload with the new colors. Tap to proceed.
Note that we cannot guarantee a stable experience if you use Swift Installer in combination with other themes or mods.

Root access is required for the Installer to work. We inform about this in the Play Store description. You can request a refund from the Play Store, or email us with your GPA code for a manual refund. Email is swiftuserhelp@gmail.com
Turn this off if you use SIM pin
%s can be themed using Swift Installer
Show a notification when an update is available to install
When a new app is installed, show a notification if an overlay is available

Our Swift Installer module allows you to: 

• Install overlays systemlessly, so they don't conflict with other modules 

• Disable all overlays by just turning off the module 

• Theme Gboard easier and better, with a custom generated system theme

 You can find it:
Our Swift Installer module allows you to theme Gboard easier and better, with a custom generated system theme.\n\n You can find it:
An overlay failed to install. Examine the result and optionally send an error log.
You need to reboot for SwiftKey to reload all colors
